## Description
The **Create packages (EI) **task allows to create packages of invoices to be sent to SDI. It consumes the output of the **Manage invoices (EI) **task.

## Configuration
**![](data:image/png;base64,)**

- In the **Alias **field, enter the name of the task that will be displayed in the workflow.

## Input
The expected input of the Create packages (EI) task is the content of the **default output branch **of the Manage invoices (EI) task (see [Manage Invoices (EI) Batch Workflow Task Reference#Default branch](/doxee-platform/docs/manage-invoices-ei-batch-workflow-task-reference#default-branch)):

- **Electronic invoice(s) **(XML or XML.P7M format)

- **invoices.manifest **file (JSON format)

- *(optional) ***eipa.delay file **for delaying the sending of the EI package to SdI

## Output
The task creates a **signed FI package **which can be sent to SdI.

Any included **eipa.delay files **will be copied into each output chunk.

For further processing of the output of the Create packages (EI) task, see [Deliver Packages (EI) Batch Workflows Task Reference](/doxee-platform/docs/deliver-packages-ei-batch-workflow-task-reference).
